title: Air traffic clears over Iran amid US-Israel attack
description: A flight animation showed planes clearing the airspace over Iran amid an attack carried out by the US and Israel.   President Donald Trump confirmed the US militaryâ€™s involvement in the strikes, after Israeli Defense Minister Israel Katz said the IDF had launched a preemptive attack on Iran.   #flightradar #iran #us #israel

title: Justin Bieber jams on piano at LA design store
description: Justin Bieber entertained staff at a Los Angeles design and furniture store as he began jamming on a piano and other instruments inside the shop. #JustinBieber #LA #LosAngeles

title: Woman dangles from ski lift in California
description: Three skiers got the scare of a lifetime at Californiaâ€™s Big Bear Mountain Resort when one of them slipped off the chairlift and was left dangling as the other two held her on.   The Big Bear Mountain Resort said Roula and her sister â€œadmitted to horseplay as the reason for her becoming suspended.â€   A spokesperson for the resort said, â€œThis is a good example of why we recommend guests always lower the safety bar and refrain from engaging in potentially dangerous or distracting behaviour while riding lifts.â€   #BigBearMountainResort #California #CA #skilift

title: Huge cooling tower demolished in Germany
description: A 117-meter-high cooling tower was destroyed as part of a move to phase out lignite mining in Germany.   The tower, which was built in the late 1960s at the former Frimmersdorf power station site, was demolished using a controlled explosion.   #Germany #demolition #coolingtower

title: Plane crash kills 15 people in Bolivia
description: A plane carrying hundreds of new banknotes has crashed in Bolivia, killing 15 people and injuring another 30. Local authorities say the military cargo plane landed, skidded off the runway and onto a busy road. #Bolivia #plancrash

title: Iran strikes US bases across Middle East
description: Iran has launched retaliatory missile strikes on US military bases across Qatar, Kuwait, the UAE, and Bahrain following a US-Israel operation named Epic Fury by Donald Trump.   The attacks have caused major disruptions to flight schedules in the region, with planes being turned back, diverted or held in holding patterns. Qatar Airlines has suspended all operations.   Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese has released a statement supporting both the Iranian people and US military action in the Middle East.   #Australia #Iran #Israel #MiddleEast #EpicFury
